-- Define the system context
model Powertrain_System

-- Define the main block
block Powertrain
{
  -- Define the internal context
  context Internal_Context
  {
    -- Define the functional requirements
    requirement Torque_Generation
    {
      description "The system should generate torque during operation."
      annotation "http://www.omg.org/spec/SysML/20110701/MOF-Stereotypes/Requirements.stereotype" "stereotype" "requirement"
      annotation "http://www.omg.org/spec/SysML/20110701/MOF-Stereotypes/Functional_Requirement.stereotype" "stereotype" "functional_requirement"
      annotation "http://www.omg.org/spec/SysML/20110701/MOF-Stereotypes/NonNegative.stereotype" "stereotype" "non_negative"
      annotation "http://www.omg.org/spec

-- Define the system
model PowerSystem

-- Define the context
context Context
  requires PowerSystem_Context in PowerSystem

-- Define the blocks
Block Engine
  extends Node
  provides Power
  provides Torque

Block Powertrain
  extends Node
  contains Engine

Block TorqueGenerator
  extends Node
  provides Torque

-- Define the relationships
Relation Engine_Powertrain
  source Powertrain
  target Engine
  provided Power

Relation TorqueGenerator_Engine
  source Engine
  target TorqueGenerator
  provided Torque
```

-- Define the security classification enumeration
model SecurityClassification
create Enumeration SecurityClassificationLevel
  member Unclassified
  member Confidential
  member Secret
endSecurityClassificationLevel

-- Define the Component class with a security classification attribute
model MySystem
create Class Component
  feature securityClassification : SecurityClassificationLevel = Unclassified
endComponent
```

-- Define the base physical quantities

Model PhysicalQuantities

Parameter Length <float value="0.0"> -- Length [m]
Parameter Mass <float value="0.0"> -- Mass [kg]
Parameter Time <float value="0.0"> -- Time [s]
Parameter ElectricCurrent <float value="0.0"> -- Electric Current [A]
Parameter Temperature <float value="0.0"> -- Temperature [K]
Parameter AmountOfSubstance <float value="0.0"> -- Amount of Substance [mol]
Parameter LuminousIntensity <float value="0.0"> -- Luminous Intensity [cd]

-- Define the derived physical quantities

Model DerivedPhysicalQuantities

Parameter Velocity <stereotype="DerivedValue"> velocity: Real(base_Quantity=Time, base_Unit="m/s")
Parameter Acceleration <stereotype="DerivedValue"> acceleration: Real(base_Quantity=Mass, base_Quantity2=Time, base_Unit="m/s^2")
Parameter Force <stereotype

-- Model: Battery Charging Control System

model BatteryChargingControlSystem

-- Define Blocks
Block Battery
Block Charger
Block BatteryManagementSystem

Battery <|-- "Has" --> Charger
Battery <|-- "Has" --> BatteryManagementSystem

-- Define Properties
Property Battery.capacity : real
Property Charger.outputPower : real
Property BatteryManagementSystem.batteryLevel : real

-- Define Relationships
Relation Battery_BatteryLevel_BatteryManagementSystem [
  source : BatteryManagementSystem,
  target : Battery,
  navigability : Bidirectional,
  end1 : "monitors",
  end2 : "is monitored by"
]

Relation Charger_Charges_Battery [
  source : Charger,
  target : Battery,
  navigability : Bidirectional,
  end1 : "charges",
  end2 : "is charged by"
]

Relation Battery_IsFullyCharged

-- Define Blocks

Block VehicleControlSystem {
  isOff(self : VehicleControlSystem) : Boolean = self.state = Off
  isStarting(self : VehicleControlSystem) : Boolean = self.state = Starting
  isStarted(self : VehicleControlSystem) : Boolean = self.state = Started
  isShuttingDown(self : VehicleControlSystem) : Boolean = self.state = ShuttingDown
  isOff_ : Boolean := false
  isStarting_ : Boolean := false
  isStarted_ : Boolean := false
  isShuttingDown_ : Boolean := false
  state(self : VehicleControlSystem) : State = Off

  -- Define Internal Transitions
  Transition Startup {
    source(self : VehicleControlSystem)
    target(self.state = Starting)
    trigger VehicleStartSignal
  }

  Transition SelfCheck {
    source(self : VehicleControlSystem)
    target(self.state = Started)
    trigger SelfCheckComplete
  }

  Transition Shutdown

Block cruiseController
  Ports:
    Input:
      dataPort1: DataPort(name="SetSpeed", dataType="Real")
      dataPort2: DataPort(name="ActualSpeed", dataType="Real")
      dataPort3: DataPort(name="FuelControlCommand", dataType="Real")

    Output:
      dataPort4: DataPort(name="EngineFuelControlCommand", dataType="Real")

  InternalFeatures:
    feature1: Feature(name="SetSpeed", dataType="Real")
    feature2: Feature(name="ActualSpeed", dataType="Real")
    feature3: Feature(name="EngineFuelControlCommand", dataType="Real")

    constraint1: Constraint(name="SpeedControlConstraint")
      expression: feature1 > feature2

    constraint2: Constraint(name="FuelControlConstraint")
      expression: feature3 = (feature1 - feature2)

Block engine
  Ports:
    Input:
      dataPort1: DataPort(name="EngineFuelControlCommand", dataType="Real")

    Output:

-- Define the system
model VehicleMassControlSystem

-- Define the context
context Context
  requires MassConstraintRequirement = "Total mass of the vehicle should not exceed 2500 kg.";

-- Define the vehicle and its components
class Vehicle
  extends Context

  property mass: Real;

class Chassis
  extends Vehicle
  requires ChassisMassRequirement = "Chassis mass should be measured and recorded.";

class Engine
  extends Vehicle
  requires EngineMassRequirement = "Engine mass should be measured and recorded.";

class Transmission
  extends Vehicle
  requires TransmissionMassRequirement = "Transmission mass should be measured and recorded.";

-- Define the mass constraints
constraint TotalMassConstraint
  for Vehicle vehicle
  inv vehicle.mass <= 2500;

constraint EngineMassConstraint
  for Engine engine
  inv engine.mass <= 1000; -- Assume engine mass limit is 1000 kg

constraint TransmissionMassConstraint
  for Transmission transmission
  inv transmission.mass <= 500; --

-- Define the vehicle and its mass
model Vehicle_Model

  Context VehicleContext

  -- Define the vehicle
  Block Vehicle
    InitialMass (initialMass: Real = 1500.0)
    FuelMass (fuelMass: Real)
    TotalMass (totalMass: Real)

    -- Constraint: With a full fuel tank, the vehicles total mass must not exceed 2000 kg
    constraint TotalMass_WithFullFuel
      for Vehicle.TotalMass
      when Vehicle.FuelMass = Vehicle.InitialMass + 500.0
      then Vehicle.TotalMass <= 2000.0

    -- Constraint: With an empty fuel tank, the vehicles total mass must not exceed 1500 kg
    constraint TotalMass_WithEmptyFuel
      for Vehicle.TotalMass
      when Vehicle.FuelMass = 0.0
      then Vehicle.TotalMass <= 1500.0

    -- Define the engine
    Part Engine
      Torque (tor

-- Define the context
context Context {
  -- Define the required packages
  import "SysML/UML/Statemachines/1.0/SysML.statemachines"
  import "SysML/UML/Actions/1.0/SysML.actions"
  import "SysML/UML/Classes/1.0/SysML.classes"
  import "SysML/UML/Interactions/1.0/SysML.interactions"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/SysML.activityfinalstates"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/SysML.activitygraphs"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/SysML.activitynodes"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/SysML.controlnodes"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/SysML.flowfinalstates"
  import "SysML/UML/SequentialFlow/1.0/Sys

-- Define the system
model PowerTransmissionSystem

-- Define the context
context Context
  requires PowerOutput: real;
endContext Context

-- Define the logical model
package LogicalModel
  extend Context

  -- Define the system
  System PowerTransmissionSystem
    -- Define the capability
    Capability PowerGeneration
      -- Define the provided interface
      Provided Interface PowerInterface
        -- Define the power output
        attribute PowerOutput: real;

      -- Define the required interface
      Required Interface TorqueInterface
        -- Define the torque
        attribute Torque: real;

      -- Define the realization
      Realization TorqueGeneration
        -- Define the torque generator
        Component TorqueGenerator
          -- Define the generating torque action
          Action GenerateTorque;

  -- Define the allocation
  Allocation Allocation_TorqueGenerator_Engine
    source TorqueGenerator;
    target Powertrain.Engine;
endPackage LogicalModel

-- Define the physical model
package PhysicalModel
  extend LogicalModel

  -- Define the powertrain
  Component Powertrain

-- Define the system
model VehicleSimulationSystem

-- Define the context
context VehicleSimulationContext

-- Define the vehicle block
block Vehicle
    extends ModelElement

    -- Define the properties
    property InitialVelocity : Real(isInitial = true)
    property InitialPosition : Real(isInitial = true)
    property Acceleration : Real
    property TimeStep : Real(isInitial = true)

-- Define the ModelCenter block
block ModelCenter
    extends ModelElement

-- Define the connection between Vehicle and ModelCenter
connection VehicleToModelCenter
    source Vehicle
    target ModelCenter
    end

-- Define the simulation operation
operation Simulate
    input Vehicle : Vehicle
    input ModelCenter : ModelCenter
    output Velocity : Real
    output Position : Real

    -- Define the precondition
    precondition
        Vehicle.InitialVelocity != null and
        Vehicle.InitialPosition != null and
        ModelCenter != null and
        Vehicle.Acceleration != null and
        Vehicle.TimeStep > 0

    --
